Title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
Overview: A representative of an alien race that went through drastic evolution to survive its own climate change, Klaatu comes to Earth to assess whether humanity can prevent the environmental damage they have inflicted on their own planet. When barred from speaking to the United Nations, he decides humankind shall be exterminated so the planet can survive.
Tagline: 12.12.08 is the Day the Earth Stood Still
Keywords: extraterrestrial technology, spacecraft, ultimatum, evacuation, panic, government, remake, ufo, alien, end of the world, giant robot, tank, social commentary, power outage, interrogation, environmentalism, threat, alien contact, central park, messenger, nanobots, disintegration
production_companies: Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Dune Entertainment III, Earth Canada Productions, Hammerhead Productions, 3 Arts Entertainment
Cast: Keanu Reeves, Jennifer Connelly, Kathy Bates
